description:
Civilization is dead, but Chito and Yuuri are still alive. So they hop aboard their beloved Kettenkrad motorbike and aimlessly wander the ruins of the world they once knew. Day after hopeless day, they look for their next meal and fuel for their ride. But as long as the two are together, even an existence as bleak as theirs has a ray or two of sunshine in it, whether they're sucking down their fill of soup or hunting for machine parts to tinker with. For two girls in a world full of nothing, the experiences and feelings the two share give them something to live for…

(Source: Yen Press)

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Denpa
tags.description: Works that feature themes of social dissociation, delusions, and other issues like suicide, bullying, self-isolation, paranoia, and technological necessity in daily lives. Classic iconography: telephone poles, rooftops, and trains.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Robots
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid machines.

tags.name: Tanks
tags.description: Prominently features the use of tanks or other armoured vehicles.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Snowscape
tags.description: Prominently or partially set in a snowy environment.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Aliens
tags.description: Prominently features extraterrestrial lifeforms.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Photography
tags.description: Centers around the use of cameras to capture photos.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.
